thread.title: Tom & Lynda Even
thread.title_full: Words Anywhere reviewed by Tom & Lynda Even

author: Tom & Lynda Even
title: Tom & Lynda Even
text: We are thrilled with the vinyl letters. We placed two orders for our "Wall of Fame" (pics of our children & families) and it turned out wonderful. The lettering was the frosting on the cake. Super fast; ordered & had the letters within 3-4 days and very cost effective too. Thanks for being so affordable.
